name: Face Maker
overview: Not to be confused with Facemaker by Spinnaker and put out the same year. Facemaker enables you to make a screen portrait of a friend or one of the family. It may not be quite what they expected, but it is fun! Like all masterpieces, there is scope for artistic interpretation. Your aunti may suddenly grow a stubbly chin or a friend develop a spate of baldness.
